title: Dead & Company Live at Times Union Center on 2015-10-29
Dead & Company Live at Barton Hall on 2023-05-08
description:
Dead & Company
Barton Hall Cornell '23
2023-05-08
Ithaca, New York

Taper: Eric Lugassy

Source: 
Channels 1 & 2: AKG c414 XLII Hypercardioids PAS 4" apart > 
Channels 3 & 4: Audio Technica 3031 Cardioids PAS 30" apart >
Channels 5 & 6: Vanguard V1 Wide-Cardioids PAS 32" apart
Zoom F6 32 Bit Float

Lineage: SD > Wav > Reaper V6.67 (Tracking/ Normalized/ Slate Digital Plugins) > Flac 24 Bit
Location: Slightly off center back of Pit to the left Approximately 14' High

What an honor, privilege, and pleasure it was to record this performance.

01. Intro / Tuning
02. New Minglewood Blues
03. Althea
04. Estimated Prophet * >
05 Eyes of the World
06. Jack Straw
07. Bertha >
08. Cassidy >
09. Deal
10. China Cat Sunflower >
11. I Know You Rider
12. Help on the Way >
13. Slipknot! >
14. Franklin's Tower >
15. Drums >
16. Space & Jam >
17. Scarlet Begonias >
18. Fire on the Mountain
19. Morning Dew
20.Terrapin Station

* With Get Up, Stand Up (The Wailers) Tease

Band Personnel:
Bobby Weir - Rhythm Guitar, Lead Vocals
Mickey Hart - Percussion, Beam
John Mayer - Lead Guitar, Lead Vocals
Jeff Chimenti - Keys
Oteil Burbridge - Bass Guitar, Percussion
Jay Lane - Drums


Check out the beneficiaries of this event with the links below:

https://www.musicares.org/
https://climate.cornell.edu/

title: Dead & Company Live at PNC Music Pavillion on 2016-06-10
description:
Dead and Company
June 10th, 2016
PNC Music Pavillion
Charlotte, NC

Beyer CK950 >Tascam DR-60D @ 24/48
Location: Sec 7 row S seat 11


Transfer: SDHC> Macbook Air>Audacity>Fission 

*24 bit/48 khz Fileset*

Recorded and uploaded by Marty Loving 

*A Team Dirty South Recording* 

Set One

01. Tuning
02. The Music Never Stopped
03. Cold Rain and Snow
04. Friend of the Devil
05. They Love Each Other
06. Liberty
07. Cassidy
08. Promised Land

Set Two

09. Eyes of the World
10. Deal
11. Estimated Prophet
12. Drums/Space
13. Feel Like a Stranger
14. Black Peter
15. Lovelight

title: Dead & Company Live at Citizens Bank Park on 2021-08-21
description:
Dead And Company
Citizens Bank Park
Philadelphia, PA
2021-08-21

Bob Weir / Guitar & Vocals
John Mayer / Guitar & Vocals
Oteil Burbridge / Bass & Vocals
Jeff Chementi / Keyboard
Bill Kreutzmann / Drums
Mickey Hart / Drums

Source: Aud > Nakamichi CM700's w 701 Caps > GakCables > Lunatec V3 > Sound Devices 722 @ 24/96
Lineage: CF 24/96 > Sound Forge Pro 13.0 - Tracking & Editing > Traders Little Helper - Convert to Flac
Recorded By: JT/NY 569johnt@gmail.com
Uploaded By: JT/NY

Set I
01) Mississippi Half Step >
02) Alabama Getaway
03) Jack Straw
04) Franklin's Tower
05) Estimated Prophet
06) Sugaree
07) Lady With A Fan > Terrapin Station >
08) The Other One
09) Drums >
10) Space >
11) The Wheel
12) Morning Dew >

Encore: 
13) One More Saturday Night >
14) BrokeDown Palace

Noted on Setlist as: "A Hurricane's A Comin' Set"  Nicely made up on the go while they had time, 2nd Set is all hand written as they went!  
It rained on and off all night long, umbrella stayed open from beginning to end.
